Jade Knife

one handed weapon (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 51
restricted [restricted]: #86 LA Mictlan - Blood and Rain
#51 MA Mictlan - Reign of the Lawgiver
#12 EA Mictlan - Reign of Blood
blood sacrifice [bloodsac]: +2
weap id [weapon]: 309 (Jade Knife)
damage [dmg]: 1
attack [att]: +1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 5N5B to forge (N1B1)

A Jade Knife is enchanted with Blood magic and used by Mictlan's priests to increase the effectiveness of their blood sacrifices. A priest using a Jade Knife can sacrifice two more slaves than usual. Only the priests of certain nations can make blood sacrifices.
